summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Washington Street from a point 120th East of 10th Avenue South to 20th Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 13075, creating Local Improvement District No. 1182 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
